Name: Header Fixer
Function: Converts first row to header or inserts missing headers.

Name: Pivot Table Builder
Function: Transforms flat data into grouped/pivoted formats.

Name: Unstacking Assistant
Function: Flattens nested structures or wide tables into long-form.

Name: Column Mapper
Function: Applies a custom column renaming schema.

Name: Hierarchy Extractor
Function: Detects and separates multilevel categorical columns.

Name: Index Reset Assistant
Function: Resets or sets a new index (multi-index supported).

Name: Column Grouper
Function: Merges or folds related columns into new structures.

Name: Datetime Structurer
Function: Breaks timestamps into parts: date, time, year, etc.

Name: Field Combiner
Function: Joins multiple fields into a single structured string/ID.

Name: Transposer
Function: Transposes tables where rows should be columns.
